meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is cut short and flat on top
meanings.sent1: His flattop haircut made him look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: She asked the barber for a flattop style for her son.
meanings.sent3: The little boy's flattop made him resemble a miniature soldier.
meanings.sent4: Her flattop was as straight as a ruler, perfectly trimmed.
meanings.sent5: The barber skillfully crafted a flawless flattop for the customer.

meanings.definition: A type of military aircraft carrier with a flat deck for launching and landing aircraft
meanings.sent1: The flattop carrier was bustling with activity as planes took off and landed.
meanings.sent2: The navy deployed the flattop to support air operations in the region.
meanings.sent3: The sailors on the flattop carrier had to work together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The flattop carrier was like a floating runway in the middle of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: From afar, the flattop carrier looked like a massive floating city.

meanings.definition: A type of mountain with a flat, level summit
meanings.sent1: The flattop mountain offered a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding landscape.
meanings.sent2: Hikers enjoyed the challenge of reaching the flattop summit.
meanings.sent3: The goats on the flattop mountain seemed to have no fear of heights.
meanings.sent4: The flattop mountain stood majestically against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The flattop summit was a perfect spot for a picnic with breathtaking views.
